name: Comet+
author: g0ldyy + Runtipi community
description: Advanced Stremio addon for streaming torrents with debrid services, indexer support, and comprehensive filtering.
short_desc: Stremio addon with debrid integration and advanced torrent indexing.

form_fields.label: Addon ID
form_fields.hint: Unique identifier for the Stremio addon.

form_fields.label: Addon Name
form_fields.hint: Display name of the addon in Stremio.

form_fields.label: FastAPI Host
form_fields.hint: Server bind address.

form_fields.label: FastAPI Port
form_fields.hint: Port on which the server listens.

form_fields.label: FastAPI Workers
form_fields.hint: Number of worker processes (-1 for auto-scaling).

form_fields.label: Use Gunicorn
form_fields.hint: Use Gunicorn server instead of uvicorn.

form_fields.label: Admin Dashboard Password
form_fields.hint: Password to access the admin dashboard.

form_fields.label: Public Metrics API
form_fields.hint: Allow public access to the metrics API (/admin/api/metrics).

form_fields.label: Database Type
form_fields.hint: Database engine: sqlite or postgresql.

form_fields.label: Database URL
form_fields.hint: PostgreSQL connection string (leave blank for SQLite).

form_fields.label: Database Path
form_fields.hint: SQLite database file path.

form_fields.label: Database Batch Size
form_fields.hint: Batch size for database import and export operations.

form_fields.label: Metadata Cache TTL
form_fields.hint: Metadata cache duration in seconds (30 days).

form_fields.label: Torrent Cache TTL
form_fields.hint: Torrent cache duration in seconds (15 days).

form_fields.label: Debrid Cache TTL
form_fields.hint: Debrid cache duration in seconds (1 day).

form_fields.label: Scrape Lock TTL
form_fields.hint: Duration for distributed scraping locks (5 minutes).

form_fields.label: Scrape Wait Timeout
form_fields.hint: Max time to wait for other instance to complete scraping (seconds).

form_fields.label: Background Scraper Enabled
form_fields.hint: Enable background content scraping.

form_fields.label: Background Scraper Workers
form_fields.hint: Number of concurrent workers for background scraping.

form_fields.label: Background Scraper Interval
form_fields.hint: Interval between scraping cycles in seconds (1 hour).

form_fields.label: Background Scraper Max Movies
form_fields.hint: Maximum number of movies to scrape per run.

form_fields.label: Background Scraper Max Series
form_fields.hint: Maximum number of series to scrape per run.

form_fields.label: Debrid Proxy URL
form_fields.hint: Proxy URL to bypass debrid service restrictions.

form_fields.label: Indexer Manager Type
form_fields.hint: Indexer type: jackett, prowlarr, or none.

form_fields.label: Indexer Manager URL
form_fields.hint: URL of Jackett or Prowlarr service.

form_fields.label: Indexer Manager API Key
form_fields.hint: API key for Jackett or Prowlarr.

form_fields.label: Indexer Manager Mode
form_fields.hint: Context mode: live, background, both, false.

form_fields.label: Indexer Manager Timeout
form_fields.hint: Search timeout in seconds.

form_fields.label: Indexer Manager Indexers
form_fields.hint: JSON array of indexer IDs to use.

form_fields.label: Get Torrent Timeout
form_fields.hint: Timeout for obtaining torrent info hash (seconds).

form_fields.label: Download Torrent Files
form_fields.hint: Enable torrent file retrieval instead of magnet links only.

form_fields.label: Scrape Comet
form_fields.hint: Enable Comet scraping: true, false, live, background, both.

form_fields.label: Comet URL
form_fields.hint: Comet service endpoint URL or JSON array for multiple instances.

form_fields.label: Scrape Nyaa
form_fields.hint: Enable Nyaa scraping: true, false, live, background, both.

form_fields.label: Nyaa Anime Only
form_fields.hint: Only scrape Nyaa if the content is anime.

form_fields.label: Nyaa Max Concurrent Pages
form_fields.hint: Maximum number of concurrent requests to Nyaa.

form_fields.label: Scrape Zilean
form_fields.hint: Enable Zilean scraping: true, false, live, background, both.

form_fields.label: Zilean URL
form_fields.hint: Zilean service endpoint URL or JSON array for multiple instances.

form_fields.label: Scrape StremThru
form_fields.hint: Enable StremThru scraping: true, false, live, background, both.

form_fields.label: StremThru Scrape URL
form_fields.hint: StremThru scraping endpoint URL or JSON array for multiple instances.

form_fields.label: Scrape Torrentio
form_fields.hint: Enable Torrentio scraping: true, false, live, background, both.

form_fields.label: Torrentio URL
form_fields.hint: Torrentio service endpoint URL or JSON array for multiple instances.

form_fields.label: Scrape MediaFusion
form_fields.hint: Enable MediaFusion scraping: true, false, live, background, both.

form_fields.label: MediaFusion URL
form_fields.hint: MediaFusion service endpoint URL or JSON array for multiple instances.

form_fields.label: MediaFusion API Password
form_fields.hint: API password for MediaFusion instances that require authentication.

form_fields.label: MediaFusion Live Search
form_fields.hint: Enable live search for MediaFusion.

form_fields.label: Scrape AIOStreams
form_fields.hint: Enable AIOStreams scraping: true, false, live, background, both.

form_fields.label: AIOStreams URL
form_fields.hint: AIOStreams service endpoint URL or JSON array for multiple instances.

form_fields.label: AIOStreams User UUID and Password
form_fields.hint: AIOStreams credentials (user_uuid:password).

form_fields.label: Scrape Jackettio
form_fields.hint: Enable Jackettio scraping: true, false, live, background, both.

form_fields.label: Jackettio URL
form_fields.hint: Jackettio manifest URL or JSON array for multiple instances.

form_fields.label: Scrape DebridIO
form_fields.hint: Enable DebridIO scraping: true, false, live, background, both.

form_fields.label: DebridIO API Key
form_fields.hint: API key for DebridIO service.

form_fields.label: Scrape TorBox
form_fields.hint: Enable TorBox scraping: true, false, live, background, both.

form_fields.label: TorBox API Key
form_fields.hint: API key for TorBox service.

form_fields.label: Proxy Debrid Stream
form_fields.hint: Enable debrid stream proxying through Comet.

form_fields.label: Proxy Debrid Stream Password
form_fields.hint: Password for accessing proxied debrid streams.

form_fields.label: Proxy Max Connections
form_fields.hint: Maximum concurrent connections (-1 to disable).

form_fields.label: Default Debrid Service
form_fields.hint: Default debrid service for proxy.

form_fields.label: Default Debrid API Key
form_fields.hint: Default API key for debrid service.

form_fields.label: Remove Adult Content
form_fields.hint: Filter out adult content automatically.

form_fields.label: Custom Header HTML
form_fields.hint: Custom HTML to inject in the header.

form_fields.label: StremThru URL
form_fields.hint: StremThru service URL for debrid services integration.
